thread.title: Watch Salman Khan, Sonam Kapoor romance in 'Jalte Diye' song
thread.title_full: Watch Salman Khan, Sonam Kapoor romance in 'Jalte Diye' song - Entertainment

author: A Correspondent
title: Watch Salman Khan, Sonam Kapoor romance in 'Jalte Diye' song
text:
Bollywood superstar Salman Khan has released the video of the romantic song 'Jalte Diye' from his upcoming film 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' also featuring Sonam Kapoor in the lead.
Watch the video of song 'Jalte Diye' 

After the success of 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan', this is Salman's much-awaited film and will feature him as Prem -- a name he has taken on in several of his films with Sooraj Barjatya -- again.
Video: Watch the title track of Salman Khan's 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' 
Salman has said it is the "most beautiful film" he has done with director Sooraj Barjatya, with whom he has teamed up with after 16 years.
The film, which releases on November 12, also stars Anupam Kher, Neil Nitin Mukesh, Swara Bhaskar and Armaan Kohli, among others.
Video: 'Prem Leela': Watch the first song of 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' 
The trailer of 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' was released earlier this month and created quite a buzz. Haven't seen the trailer yet? Watch it here.
